reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight easy to store
reviews.reviewText: My grandson comes after school so we wanted outdoor toys for him to play with at our house. I wanted it easily put away too and this fit the built. Not the highest quality but not worst

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for storing until spring!
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad practice set to get your younger child understanding and grasping fundamentals. Easy to store by hanging on a screw to keep clutter down when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fast service. Product box a little damaged. Over all satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my granddaughter as a gift, she really seems to like it very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product package arrived crushed, but the amazon box outside is perfect
reviews.reviewText: The item arrived with its package crushed to a point that even the box seal is broken, but amazon box outside is perfectly fine. It was bought for as a bday gift, luckily to my own child and not a gift to others otherwise the broken package will be a big problem. The item itself is fine and works great for its purpose. Only issue i have is it tips over very easily which makes the pop up mechanism hard to work well. My kid spent more time adjusting and fiddling with the base part to try to get the ball to come out than actual hitting it with a bat. It’s a nice idea though if the base can hold better and not to tip around so easily and balls wont stuck at the base that often. Nevertheless, my 6 yr old kid still loves the idea of having it and he still keeps on trying to get it to work. I am still trying to see how i can do something maybe help him make it easier to have the ball pop out without so much unnecessary adjustments at every single time he tries to swing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good toy and even better costumer service.
reviews.reviewText: The product itself is pretty good. However, it is not durable. We bought the pedal push kind and the top that holds the ball and pushes it up in the air, broke the first day. Maybe if they can improve the quality of the plastic.New review,The seller send me a new toy with no extra charge. Seller even shared the shipping info for tracking. Luckily it came right on the sons birthday so he was happy. Thank you to the seller. My kids love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bat is made of two plastic pieces that collapse easily—and constantly, even when in use! Because there is no way to screw or lock the bat into the extended position, it is not functional. I bought this for a toddler and am completely sorry that I did.
